#include<stdio.h>

int main ( ) {
    int n,i,j,count=0,k;
    scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
    long long arr[n],a,b;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
        scanf("%lld",&arr[i]);
    }
    for(i=0;i<n-1;i++){
        a=arr[i]+k;
        b=arr[i]-k;
        for(j=i+1;j<n;j++){
            if(arr[j]==a || arr[j]==b){
                count++;
            }
        }
    }
    printf("%d",count);

return 0;
}
